title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Student-Centered Problem-Based Learning for Training Aesthetic Dental Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners analyze three real patient cases (tooth discoloration, malocclusion, missing teeth) and establish a five-step aesthetic treatment plan (tooth shape, color, alignment). They must achieve an "Excellent" rating in at least two of the three rubric criteria: treatment appropriateness, practicality, creativity
Learners apply expert-level aesthetic requirement evaluation criteria with 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate the ability to improve treatment designs through peer feedback on three or more occasions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
